citation.case_name: American Coalition of Life Activists v. Planned Parenthood of the Columbia/willamette, Inc.

html:
537 U.S. 1087

AMERICAN COALITION OF LIFE ACTIVISTS ET AL.
v.
PLANNED PARENTHOOD OF THE COLUMBIA/WILLAMETTE, INC., ET AL.

No. 02-563.

Supreme Court of United States.

December 16, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE NINTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 9th Cir. The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.
